title: Elegant Crimson Silk Crepe Maxi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of an elegant crimson red silk crepe maxi dress, A-line silhouette, sleeveless, V-neck, floor-length, tailored waist with flowing skirt, subtle side slit, invisible back zipper, delicate topstitching, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims

materials.zipper: invisible nylon zipper in matching color

techpack.finishing: delicate topstitching along neckline and armholes, hem finished with narrow rolled hem
